extendedInfo.description: Control your ChamberlainÂ® MyQÂ®-enabled garage door opener and house lights from anywhere in the world.*** Note, you must have a Chamberlain Internet Gateway and a Chamberlain MyQ account to log into this app.  To sign up for a free Chamberlain MyQ account, see www.mychamberlain.com. ***The Chamberlain MyQ Home Control App is perfect for anyone who has ever left the house and wondered if their garage door was opened or wished they could turn on lights to make it look like they are home while they are away.The Chamberlain Internet Gateway accessory and the Chamberlain MyQ App allow you to monitor and control your Chamberlain MyQ enabled garage door opener and light controls with your Android phone or tablet.  And with push notifications enabled, the device can receive alerts that the garage door is open or a light was left on.-	Monitor and control multiple garage door openers-	Turn on or off lights-	Customize to receive alerts when the garage door or lighting status changed-	Edit account information-	Enhance your security by adding a passcode of your choice-	Modify security levelsRequires a Chamberlain MyQ enabled garage door opener or Chamberlain Internet Connectivity Kit with a compatible garage door opener.  In order to control lights, a Chamberlain MyQ light switch or Chamberlain MyQ lamp control is required.See www.chamberlain.com for additional information.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Peace of mind knowing that I didn\'t forget to close the garage door after leaving the house. Easy to set up and use.
reviews.author: Andrew DeRyckere

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: I\'m not sure what others are having problems with but it works great for me.  Even sends the alerts I set it up for on time.  The only thing I think it needs is the ability to turn off beeping when closing but I\'m sure that\'s probably for safety.  Love the app.
reviews.author: Tommie Patten

reviews.comment: There is a big delay on the status of the garage door.  App is not very responsive.\tdefinitely need some refining work. Looking forward the release of new app.
reviews.author: Austin Pan

reviews.title: Works great before the latest update
reviews.comment: This app worked great before the update after not so much. The push notifications work sometimes but not everytime and I am getting notifications that the door has been opened and closed but it doesn\'t show up in the event history .
reviews.author: ed crowder

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: Love it. works great so far. want to add lighting module to it.
reviews.author: Ken Fielder

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Had issues at first but updates fixed a lot of problems.
reviews.author: Joe Serio

reviews.title: Ridiculously slow
reviews.comment: I got the push notice \"your garage door just opens\" 3 hours after it actually happens.
reviews.author: Danh Nguyen

reviews.title: Sweet, when logged in
reviews.comment: Only had it for an hour or so, awesome so far. Changed my security to not require log in each time but isn\'t saving... still asks for password. So far so good tho. Someone really needs to look into the log in issues. Very annoying to save settings that don\'t work right.
reviews.author: Danny Bever

reviews.title: SLOW
reviews.comment: App is unreliable and slow to take action. Frequently have to re-log in. Takes too long to load and the lag to open garage doors leaves you better off using the key pad that came with the unit.
reviews.author: Alec Nelsen

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: It\'s ok. Works to open and close. Takes a while to connect and to refresh list. Wish it wouldn\'t beep and flash the garage light when closing and wish it was faster. At times it takes minutes to open the door. Request would be to be able to stop the door at different positions
reviews.author: Javier Medina

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Hangs when logging in.
reviews.author: David Xu

reviews.title: Improvement needed
reviews.comment: Event time is 1 hour behind even time zone is set correctly.  Widgets to close and open garage door would be awesome!
reviews.author: Brandon Au

reviews.title: A little slow
reviews.comment: Works as advertised, but can take over a minute to respond sometimes. And for those who hate logging in every time, you can change that in the security settings.
reviews.author: Raleigh Byers

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: So far just ok. Samsung Galaxy Note 2. Swiping between garage doors on my device does not always respond. After reboot forces login again. Issues in syncing if operation is interrupted by safety reverse. This app doesn\'t need to be fancy but a little smoother and more responsive would be ideal.
reviews.author: Matthew Hibshman

reviews.title: Password
reviews.comment: 1 star since it does not let us save our password, update your app and I will update my review.
reviews.author: Michael Goff

reviews.title: Constantly asking for pw
reviews.comment: Average: works as advertised. The largest problem is that there is no option to save the password. Constantly having to input password makes it inconvenient to turn off/on my light switches using MyQ.
reviews.author: Leonardo Montilla

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: Simple to use and it works as advertised. It may be slow sometimes and us you have to enter your password each time but those are minor quirks that I will trade for the fact that it is free.
reviews.author: Doug Beall

reviews.title: Unreliable
reviews.comment: Takes forever to load devices and 5 minutes to take action. Wish it didnt take so long. Worked great on iphone. Why such a difference with android?
reviews.author: Jon Harvey

reviews.title: Great start
reviews.comment: Keeps asking for a password or the pin every few seconds when the app is open. Good start but a few bugs.
reviews.author: Lance LaMee

reviews.title: Crashes a lot
reviews.comment: I have only used this application for a week, but the program fails to load on the first try.  Sometimes it fails to load on the second try.  When that happens it lost the ability to comminicate with the gateway and I have to reset the gateway.  It is really slow when trying to refresh for a devices too.
reviews.author: Doug Chiu
